Don't know about the other comments, for me it works just fine. Big thanks for the team, you work miracles.
Just one thing: if you receive an upgrade, choose it, but then die after reaching the next checkpoint, you start again from the last point, you keep the selected upgrade plus can pick another one. I don't know whether it is a glitch in the original game or it is crack-related but definitely it is an issue.
Apart from that, completely playable and a very very good game. Thanks again, recommended.
